entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning early this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 2 April 2023
